casebody.data:
CITY OF DEARBORN, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, Defendant/Cross-Defendant-Appellee,
and
West Dearborn Partners LLC, Defendant/Counterplaintiff/Cross-Plaintiff-Appellant. MSC: 159691
COA: 339704 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 24, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 2, 2019.
